synopsis.text: She is the last human standing in a world that has crumbled, but she's not alone. With her wise-cracking, philosophical Shiba Inu, Haru, they traverse the desolate wasteland left behind after civilization's downfall. Despite the bleak surroundings, Haru's clever antics, humorous insights, and thoughtful musings keep his master from succumbing to despair, proving that even in the aftermath of an apocalypse, life can still be filled with laughter and camaraderie. As the last girl on Earth, her journey through the ruins of humanity is anything but dull with Haru by her side, turning a doomsday scenario into an endearing tale of friendship and hope. (Source: Assistant's own synopsis)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
